channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: TMC - Defects - Signs & Street Furniture problem, 8th September
item.description:
Remove 4 x damaged & rusted posts - 28 days - 3 way lights (Damaged Sign Post)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mud and mulch needs to be cleaned off drain outside Parkway, 8th September
item.description:
I have already reported as a blocked drain but GCC have advised that while they are in the process of getting the drains cleared that I must separately contact Cheltenham Borough Council in order to ask them to clear all the mass of mud and mulch which is currently sitting on top of the drain and causing the pavement to be unusable due to flooding every time it rains. This needs to be done frequently and kept on top off. Please action ASAP and please increase the frequency of cleaning. The drain in question is directly outside Parkway on West Drive. Many thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): West Drive, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 8th September
item.description:
FixMyStreet ref: 8108755. Foliage growing out of tree trunk. lime tree outside house but it has a lot of foliage growing out from trunk, Mums with children stop by it to cross the road when taking children to school but at the moment it is difficult to see what traffic is coming up Arle Road.. I was just asking if it is on the highways dept. to do list soon
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Expanding pothole, 7th September
item.description:
The road breaking up in this area badly. The whole road is being closed for a whole day on 15th September to fix potholes at the other end of the road near No 20, some of which arenâ€™t as bad as these ones. On 15th of September the whole road is being closed. Please ensure that you fix all the potholes on the road otherwise your inconveniencing thousands of people only to have to do it again in a few months time. Do it properly do all of the potholes please and come and have a look at these because they are as deep as some of the ones which have yellow marks round them near No 20.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 6, Greenhills Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked footpath, 7th September
item.description:
Footpath from the A435 starts off okay but then passes a derelict property for sale and as the path should go up the hill to the road it's totally overgrown and not possible to pass through. Therefore, the only option is to retreat back to the main road and take one of the alternative footpaths nearby.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elkstone, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet
